name: Dinos Activated
author: Puzoor
notes:
First time KOG! All the way from Platinum 3 to Legend 2 with Glads Balance, same decklist that I used to get 3rd/4th on the Giveaway tournament.

From Legend 2 to KoG I used Dinos. Fun and fast games, big otk potential. Salamandra, Hydrogeddon and AMA were the MVP's.
